languages.text: "Сам не знаю... Вы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}не проявляли особого интереса к нашей церкви{/d}, так что считайте, что я пришел выразить свое почтение как старый пустотник, а не духовное лицо. Желаю вам удачи как один покоритель пустоты — друго{mf|му|й}".

"I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."
languages.original_text: "Сам не знаю... Вы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}не проявляли особого интереса к нашей церкви{/d}, так что считайте, что я пришел выразить свое почтение как старый пустотник, а не духовное лицо. Желаю вам удачи как один покоритель пустоты — друго{mf|му|й}".

traits.locale_text: "I don't even know... You were never particularly interested in our church, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, and not a clergyman. So, one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “我也说不好……你{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}对我们的教会从来都不感兴趣{/d}，所以你就别把我当成什么神职人员了，就把我当成个老水手吧。就让我这个战胜了虚空的人，也来祝你这个战胜了虚空的人一切顺利。”
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: “我也说不好……你对我们的教会从来都不感兴趣，所以你就别把我当成什么神职人员了，就把我当成个老水手吧。就让我这个战胜了虚空的人，也来祝你这个战胜了虚空的人一切顺利。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「さっぱり分かりません…あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}私達の使命にあまり関心を示しませんでした{/d}。だから、私を聖職者ではなく、敬意を払いに来た老いぼれのヴォイズマンだと思っているかもしれません。ですから一人の征服者として…幸運を祈ります」
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: 「さっぱり分かりません…あなたは{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}私達の使命にあまり関心を示しませんでした{/d}。だから、私を聖職者ではなく、敬意を払いに来た老いぼれのヴォイズマンだと思っているかもしれません。ですから一人の征服者として…幸運を祈ります」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «No sé... {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}Nunca le interesó demasiado nuestra misión{/d}, así que puede pensar que no soy nada más que un viejo navegante que ha venido a presentar sus respetos y no un clérigo. Así que, de un conquistador del vacío a otro: buena suerte».
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: «No sé... Nunca le interesó demasiado nuestra iglesia, así que puede pensar que no soy nada más que un viejo que ha venido a presentar sus respetos y no un clérigo. Así que, de un conquistador del vacío a otro: buena suerte».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht genau ... Ihr {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}wart nie groß an unserer Mission interessiert{/d}, Ihr könnt mich also auch einfach als alten Raumfahrer sehen, der seinen Respekt zollen will. Nicht als Priester. Unter Eroberern der Leere also — viel Glück."
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht genau ... Ihr wart nie groß an unserer Kirche interessiert, Ihr könnt mich also auch einfach als alten Raumfahrer sehen, der seinen Respekt zollen will. Nicht als Priester. Unter Eroberern der Leere also — viel Glück."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Je ne saurais le dire... Vous ne vous êtes {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}jamais vraiment {mf|intéressé|intéressée} à notre mission{/d}, alors pour vous, je ne suis peut-être rien de plus qu'un vieux pirate venu vous présenter ses hommages, et non un homme d'Église. Alors, d'un conquérant du vide à {mf|un|une} autre : bonne chance. »
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne saurais le dire... Vous ne vous êtes jamais vraiment {mf|intéressé|intéressée} à notre culte, alors pour vous, je ne suis peut-être rien de plus qu'un vieux pirate venu vous présenter ses hommages, et non un homme d'Église. Alors, d'un conquérant du vide à {mf|un|une} autre : bonne chance. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Bilmiyorum. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}Hiçbir zaman misyonumuza özel bir ilgi beslemediniz{/d}, dolayısıyla beni bir din adamı olarak değil de saygılarını sunmaya gelen, ihtiyar bir uçsuz eri olarak düşünebilirsiniz. Uçsuzu fetheden birinden bir diğerinedir sözüm: İyi şanslar."
languages.original_text: "I don't even know... You were {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}never particularly interested in our mission{/d}, so you might as well think of me as an old voidsman who's come to pay his respects, not a clergyman. So, from one conqueror of the void to another — good luck."

traits.locale_text: "Bilmiyorum. {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Min}Misyonumuza yönelik hiçbir zaman özel bir ilgi beslemediniz{/d}, dolayısıyla beni, bir din adamı olarak değil de, saygılarını sunmaya gelen ihtiyar bir uçsuz eri olarak düşünebilirsiniz. Uçsuzu fetheden birinden bir diğerine gelsin: İyi şanslar."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
